EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data Science Tech Workshops_Q3-416.Reminder - Fiat/FCA 11-3-16
EmailTemplate.subject: FCA Data Science Technical Workshop Location & Logistics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/data-science-workshops]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
You are receiving this email because you have been registered for the FCA Pivotal Data Science Technical Workshop in Turin, on November 4th (14h00 - 18h00).
Here are some important details that you need to know prior to attending the workshop.
Location: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles corso Giovanni Agnelli 200 10135 Turin Map <[[https://www.google.sn/maps/search/FCA+Corso+Giovanni+Agnelli,+200+10135+Turin/@45.0283592,7.6297487,17z/data=!3m1!4b1]]>
Your Pivotal instructor: Sarah Aerni
Prepare your system for the workshop: If you are planning to follow the workshop labs, you will need to have a client ssh program installed. There are several open source / free programs available:
- Windows: Putty <[[http://www.putty.org/]]> or MobaXterm <[[http://mobaxterm.mobatek.net/download.html]]> (MobaXterm is preferred) - MacOS: Native built in - Linux: Native built in - You are also welcome to use any commercial version you may have
Please contact Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]> for additional questions.
Kind Regards, The Pivotal Team
